main event: A young boy sighted a reddish-orange disk-shaped object hovering in Quincy, Massachusetts on 16 March 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as being similar in size to a small weather balloon., It hovered in the air for approximately two minutes., The object moved off at great speed straight up into the night sky after hovering., The incident was reported as part of Project Blue Book investigations., The report was noted and forwarded for further evaluation by the Department of the Air Force.
witness description: a young boy of about eight years of age
